sentences.english: He weighed out half pound of coffee beans to them.
sentences.chinese: 他称出半斤咖啡豆分给他们。

sentences.english: In this paper, we report the water soluble antioxidant abstract from useless coffee bean.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了从等外品咖啡豆提取水溶性食品抗氧化剂。

sentences.english: Well, for one thing good coffee beans are never splintered or broken.
sentences.chinese: 那么好的一件事咖啡豆从来割裂或破碎。

sentences.english: The gonococcus and meningococcus, for example, are coffee-bean shaped.
sentences.chinese: 例如，淋球菌和脑膜炎球菌都呈咖啡豆形。

sentences.english: Mocha coffee beans are one of the oldest known varieties of coffee in the world.
sentences.chinese: 摩卡咖啡豆是世界上已知的最古老的咖啡品种之一。

sentences.english: You grind coffee beans in your mouth.
Beans were brought to the island in 1728 by the governor at that time.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡豆是于1728年被总督带到岛屿上的。

sentences.english: This low price is a function of over-supply in the market.
sentences.chinese: 市场上过多的供应量压低了咖啡豆的价格。

sentences.english: Use Coffee flavoured Vodka, or a drop of Kahlua, Garnish with Coffee bean.
sentences.chinese: 使用咖啡味伏特加，少许卡鲁瓦，饰以咖啡豆。

sentences.english: The coffee beans are too good to be used by me.
sentences.chinese: 女侍应笑言怕自己辜负了上好的咖啡豆。

sentences.english: By that time, the beans are a delicious-looking, dark shade of brown.
sentences.chinese: 在那个时间，咖啡豆是很漂亮的外观，深棕色。

sentences.english: I love the delightful odour of freshly roasted coffee beans.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢新烘咖啡豆的清香气味。

sentences.english: Matured on the high plateaus of Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 采用源自巴西高原的阿拉比卡咖啡豆。

sentences.english: Wang Zhongxue's family members sort through the "green beans" of this year's harvest.
sentences.chinese: 王中学的一家人分检今年收获的咖啡豆。

sentences.english: The coffee bean powder then is very special, entering boiling water, they changed the water then.
sentences.chinese: 粉状咖啡豆粉则很独特，进入沸水，它们便改变了水。

sentences.english: She grinds coffee beans every day.

definition: to cure by drying over a fire (tea, meat etc)/to bake

pinyin: Yi4 shi4 nong2 suo1 ka1 fei1

definition: "kopi luwak" or civet coffee, made from coffee beans plucked from Asian palm civet's feces
